p:
In Australia, epidemics of HPeV3 have appeared to be larger than those observed in other countries and associated with poorer clinical outcomes
4 . In late 2017 to early 2018, the largest HPeV epidemic to date occurred. A large number of cases were initially seen in Victoria in south eastern Australia, before a similar increase in cases appeared in other states
4 . The objective of this study was to genetically characterize the human parechoviruses involved in the outbreak in south-east Australia in 2017â€“18, and determine if an association existed between the genotype of the virus and the severity of disease observed in infected infants.
